title: Business Analyst - Cloud Solutions
description:
Job Title: Business Analyst - Cloud Solutions

Location: Bangalore

Experience: 4-6 Years

Skills Required: Business Analysis, wireframing, Cloud

Responsibilities


Own the backlog and the backlog grooming ceremony.
Ensure maximum availability to the team for clarifications and address blockers.
Elaborate business and functional requirements into User Stories
Responsible for requirements quality, including acceptance criteria and wireframes


Education And Experience


Bachelor/Master degree with information technology
Required additional experience of 5 years with working in an IT environment as a business analyst, developer or similar
Required experience of at least 3 years as a Business Analyst


Competencies


Excellent written and oral communication in English
Strong wireframing and analytical skills
Quickly understand the requirements


Behavioral Characteristics


Flexible
Collaboration skills
Open to constructive criticism and quick learning ability
Adaptability
